subject: Basketball
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. suspended Baylor forward Perry Jones III, one of the nation’s top freshmen, for accepting impermissible benefits from his A.A.U. coach.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. suspended Baylor forward Perry Jones III, one of the nation’s top freshmen, for accepting impermissible benefits from his A.A.U. coach.
